title: Crew Show (MC20, WRX, Tesla suit, Q&A)
description:
A review of the Subaru WRX 2022; Tesla' autopilot might have a serious legal problem; we drove the Maserati MC20 (and talk about the competition); and we answer questions about GR86 vs Boxster, owning vs financing, fun family cars, and watches!

Recorded on January 19, 2022

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.
